titles.title: RS460 Thee we praise High Priest & Victim

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Here, a dedicated priesthood,
we are met to worship thee;
all thy saints, on earth, in heaven,
humbly bend the adoring knee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Here we see the mystery telling
of thy wondrous love for all;
here in prayer and sacred symbol
we thy boundless love recall.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
See thy Body bruised and broken,
see thy Blood for us outpoured;
thou the Priest and thou the Victim,
holy, holy, holy Lord!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Now thou standest at thine altar
feeding us with food divine;
here thy flesh and blood thou givest,
making us most truly thine.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Lo! in adoration bending,
we receive what thou dost give;
join the angels' choir unending,
feed by faith on thee and live.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Praise to thee, eternal Saviour!
Praises from the earth ascend;
praises from the saints in heaven,
alleluias without end.
